blogPost.excerpt: Buffelist is a URL listing platform to reach high-quality content on the internet by letting people reach other's content suggestions. You can also share your content suggestions by creating your list. Briefly, Buffelist is a social bookmarking platform.
blogPost.body: Buffelist is a URL listing platform to reach high-quality content on the internet by letting people reach other's content suggestions. You can also share your content suggestions by creating your list. Briefly, Buffelist is a social bookmarking platform.
blogPost.title: Buffelist - Content link listing platform to share useful content links
blogPost.author: Bekir

localize.description: Buffelist是一个URL列表平台，通过让人们达到别人的内容建议，来达到互联网上的优质内容。你也可以通过创建你的列表来分享你的内容建议。简单来说，Buffelist是一个社交书签平台。
localize.tagline: 内容链接列表平台，分享有用的内容链接

localize.description: Buffelist是一個URL列表平臺，通過讓人們達到別人的內容建議，來達到互聯網上的優質內容。你也可以通過創建你的列表來分享你的內容建議。簡單來說，Buffelist是一個社交書籤平臺。
localize.tagline: 內容鏈接列表平臺，分享有用的內容鏈接

previous.excerpt: Popl is the next generation business card! 📲 Business people put our NFC sticker on their phones to instantly share contact info with potential clients.
previous.title: Popl - Share your digital business card with a tap

localize.description: Popl是新一代的名片! 📲商务人士将我们的NFC贴纸贴在手机上，可以即时与潜在客户分享联系信息。
localize.tagline: 轻点一下就能分享您的数字名片

localize.description: Popl是新一代的名片! 📲商務人士將我們的NFC貼紙貼在手機上，可以即時與潛在客戶分享聯繫信息。
localize.tagline: 輕點一下就能分享您的數字名片

next.excerpt: SST (Serverless Stack) is a framework that makes it easy to build serverless apps. It features: -- - A Live Lambda Development environment - Zero-config support for ES and TypeScript - Higher-level constructs designed for serverless
next.title: SST - Work on your serverless apps live

localize.description: SST(Serverless Stack)是一个可以轻松构建无服务器应用的框架。它的特点是
localize.tagline: 在您的无服务器应用程序上实时工作

localize.description: SST(Serverless Stack)是一個可以輕鬆構建無服務器應用的框架。它的特點是
localize.tagline: 在您的無服務器應用程序上實時工作
